net.varkhan.base.management.logging
Interface LogConfig

All Known Subinterfaces:
Logger<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
LogConfigMap, LogConfigPrefix, LogConfigProps, SimpleLogger
public interface LogConfig

A log messaging configuration.

Field Summary
static long SET_MARKER
          The bit mask for the sign bit of 64-bit integers, and definition marker for set level masks
 
Method Summary
 long getLevel(java.lang.String ctx, java.lang.String key)
          Return the logging level mask.
 boolean isLevelEnabled(java.lang.String ctx, java.lang.String key, int lev)
          Indicate whether a particular logging level is enabled.
 

Field Detail

SET_MARKER

static final long SET_MARKER
The bit mask for the sign bit of 64-bit integers, and definition marker for set level masks

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getLevel

long getLevel(java.lang.String ctx,
              java.lang.String key)
Return the logging level mask.

Parameters:
ctx - a context name
key - a filter key
Returns:
the enabled severity level mask for context ctx and key key, with a non-zero sign bit (set bit of SET_MARKER) or 0L if the mask is not defined

isLevelEnabled

boolean isLevelEnabled(java.lang.String ctx,
                       java.lang.String key,
                       int lev)
Indicate whether a particular logging level is enabled.

Parameters:
ctx - a context name
key - a filter key
lev - a severity level
Returns:
true iff logging for the severity level lev is enabled, for context ctx and key key
